'Cangjie programming language_enum_type_enum_constructors': 'In Cangjie code language, Constructors in enums represent the possible values of the enum type. They can be parameterless or parameterized.
Parameterless constructors: Represent simple values.
Parameterized constructors: Carry one or more parameters, allowing additional data to be associated with each value.'

Code_Example:
enum RGBColor {
    | Red(UInt8) | Green(UInt8) | Blue(UInt8)
}

'Cangjie programming language_enum_type_enum_recursive_definition': 'In Cangjie code language, Enums in Cangjie can be recursively defined, allowing constructors to reference the enum type itself.'

Code_Example:
enum Expr {
    | Num(Int64)
    | Add(Expr, Expr)
    | Sub(Expr, Expr)
}
